scripts.generate-java: npm run bundle && cp -r unit ./dist/java-sdk && openapi-generator-cli generate -g java -i ./dist/bundledSchema.json -o ./dist/java-sdk --openapi-normalizer REFACTOR_ALLOF_WITH_PROPERTIES_ONLY=true
scripts.generate-ruby: npm run bundle && cp -r unit ./dist/ruby-sdk && openapi-generator-cli generate -g ruby -i ./dist/bundledSchema.json -o ./dist/ruby-sdk
